TopicTitle: How to have rotation and translation mode at once?

Articles.Content: Im wondering if it is possible to have translation and rotation i docking mode at once, like WASD will be rotation and IJKL will be translation so i dont need to always switch between them

Use Staging Mode.

QE WASD Rotation

HN IJKL Translation
Exactly. The point of docking mode is to unify the commands (and to make it more real-life-like), if you don't like it you can actually dock in staging mode without any trouble.
I think it's WAY easier to dock in staging mode

I think it's WAY easier to dock in staging mode

Agreed. Switching back and forth just confuses me, and I end up doing the wrong thing because I forgot which I'm on.

There's also a checkbox to 'use staging controls in docking mode', not sure but I'm guessing it does exactly what it says on the tin. Haven't used it myself though.

Switching back and forth just confuses me

Why would you need to switch "back and forth"? Just turn on asas for docking, there will be no need for rotation.

Unless your target has rotation...

Or your RCS placement isn't perfect...

Or your target isn't facing N+/-

Or you need to point non parallel to see to maneuver

Yeah, no need to switch back and forth.
